comments.comment: It's almost perfect

I had Cloud 2 and I still do since day 1 they came to my local shop....Best investment I've ever made...They still look new and work perfectly like new, 10/10 great product....Really durable and long lasting!
The sound for music is so freaking good

7 years later and they are still probably still one of the best gaming headsets on the market.
It sounds nice
currently i am having a lot of issues with the mic but the audio quality on these are amazing

New ones (HP) have poor build quality and sound like shit , expecially on fps like valorant or cs2.

I purchased this headset in the black friday sale for £45 . 
It's ten tines better than I expected, 
The aluminium gives them a premium feel and they are so comfortable.  
The sound quality is amazing,  
I play call of duty and I can hear foot steps from far away .
